archimate:Requirement.name: UN_FO_9
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a forecasting duty officer I need to be able to export a variety of observed and forecast data and/or documents (e.g. extent, summary information, forecasts, warnings, inundation and impacts) that is related to a geographical area, which can be pre-defined or selected in real-time, so that I can pass the information on to a variety of sources (e.g. emergency responders, partners or the general public).
